title: Keerti Rose Day Single-Page Love Letter (Dreamy Pastel + Animations)

requirements.summary: Create a single-page vertically-stacked love-letter layout with centered hero composition and romantic dreamy aesthetic throughout.
acceptanceCriteria: The app renders as a single-page experience (no required navigation) with one primary vertically-stacked layout: background + centered hero + headline/subtitle + footer.
Visual style is consistently romantic/dreamy/soft/pastel across all sections (no default template look).

file_operations.description: Create the single-page App shell that renders one vertically-stacked layout (background layers + centered hero + headline/subtitle + footer). Use the build-template-react + initial-app setup (Tailwind + app entry wiring) to keep structure consistent; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure the root render remains single-page (no routing requirements added) and that App is mounted as the only required view for this experience.

requirements.summary: Implement full-viewport dreamy warm pastel gradient background with smooth animated overlay layers (sparkles, dust, bokeh).
acceptanceCriteria: Background shows a multi-stop gradient in the specified warm/pastel palette and fills the full viewport height.
At least three distinct overlay animation layers are visible (sparkles + dust + bokeh) and move slowly without distracting jitter.
Animations perform smoothly on typical laptop/mobile screens (no obvious stutter) and do not block scrolling/interactions.

file_operations.description: Define the global romantic gradient background styles and reusable animation utilities (slow drift for dust/bokeh, subtle twinkle for sparkles). Include accessibility via prefers-reduced-motion and ensure overlays do not intercept pointer events.

Extend Tailwind theme tokens to support the warm blush/peach/cream/gold palette and add named keyframes/animations for slow drift, bokeh float, and sparkle twinkle, used across the single-page layout.

Create a lightweight overlay-layer component that renders three distinct visual layers (sparkles, dust particles, bokeh) using CSS/Tailwind animations and the generated overlay texture; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire DreamyOverlays into the single-page layout behind the hero/text content and ensure it covers the full viewport without blocking interactions.

requirements.summary: Build a centered hero visual using the generated illustration, add gentle glow around the rose/hands area, and animate floating rose petals.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero visual is prominently centered and clearly depicts the described rose-offering moment (hand offering deep red rose; Keerti accepting; warm smile).
A subtle glow effect is visible around the hands/rose area.
Floating rose petals are visible in/around the hero area and animate gently (slow drift).

file_operations.description: Create the centered hero visual component that displays the generated illustration and applies a soft glow effect around the focal area (hands/rose), plus layered floating petals in the hero region; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a dedicated petals animation layer (slow drifting petals) optimized for smooth performance (CSS transforms/opacity) and safe for interaction (pointer-events none); verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Place HeroRoseIllustration in the centered hero composition and ensure petals render in/around the hero without obscuring text readability.

requirements.summary: Add exact headline/subtitle text with romantic typography, glow styling, and readable contrast on all screen sizes.
acceptanceCriteria: Headline text matches exactly (including emoji) and is displayed in a cursive/handwritten-style font with a soft glow.
Subtitle text matches exactly and uses a readable elegant font distinct from the headline.
Text contrast remains readable against the animated background on desktop and mobile sizes.

file_operations.description: Load the two-font pairing (handwritten/cursive for headline + elegant serif/sans for subtitle/footer) using a safe webfont approach (e.g., hosted font links) and set appropriate preconnect/performance hints.

Create a text block component rendering the exact headline ‚ÄúHappy Rose Day, My Love Keerti üåπ‚Äù and exact subtitle ‚ÄúEvery rose reminds me of you, and every moment with you feels magical.‚Äù with glow styling and responsive typography; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add global typography variables/classes for headline/subtitle fonts plus soft-glow text utilities and readable contrast treatment over animated backgrounds.
Wire RomanticCopy into the centered hero stack directly beneath the hero visual and ensure layout remains vertically stacked and centered across breakpoints.

requirements.summary: Add tasteful motion: initial load fade-in for hero/text, shimmer/pulsing glow on headline, and scroll-reactive hearts/petals intensification.
acceptanceCriteria: On page load, hero and text fade/slide in smoothly (no abrupt pop-in).
Headline has a subtle shimmer or pulsing glow effect that remains tasteful and not overly bright.
When scrolling, additional heart/petal elements animate in a noticeable but soft way (e.g., more petals drift, or hearts appear briefly).

file_operations.description: Implement a small hook that tracks scroll progress/intensity (with throttling via requestAnimationFrame) to drive gentle increases in decorative animation density without impacting performance.

Create a lightweight scroll-reactive hearts (and/or extra petals) layer that becomes more visible or spawns brief elements as the user scrolls, respecting prefers-reduced-motion; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add keyframes/classes for fade-in on load, subtle shimmer/pulsing glow for headline emphasis, and slow drift animations; ensure animations are transform/opacity-based for smoothness.
Add/adjust named animations (fade-in-up, soft-shimmer, glow-pulse, float-slow) to be used by hero/text and scroll-reactive layers.
Wire the initial load animations to hero/text and attach scroll-intensified decorative layers (ScrollHeartsLayer / PetalsLayer) so effects increase subtly as the user scrolls.

requirements.summary: Add the bottom footer message with exact default text and soft romantic styling.
acceptanceCriteria: A footer line appears at the bottom of the page reading exactly ‚ÄúForever Yours ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äù.
Footer styling is subtle and consistent with the romantic theme (smaller size, gentle glow or soft color).

file_operations.description: Create a footer component that renders exactly ‚ÄúForever Yours ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äù with subtle glow/soft color and spacing that sits at the bottom of the single-page layout; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Place FooterMessage at the bottom of the vertically-stacked page layout with consistent spacing and responsive alignment.

requirements.summary: Define and apply a coherent romantic theme system (warm palette, typography pairing, spacing) consistently across the page (avoid blue/purple dominance).
acceptanceCriteria: A consistent palette using blush/peach/cream/warm gold is applied to background, text accents, and decorative elements.
Typography pairing feels handwritten + elegant, and is applied consistently (headline vs subtitle vs footer).
No section uses an unrelated default theme; overall presentation looks intentionally designed for the romantic love-letter mood.

file_operations.description: Define theme CSS variables for blush/peach/cream/warm-gold accents, text colors, glow strengths, and spacing rhythm, and apply them globally so the page avoids a default template appearance.
Map the romantic theme variables into Tailwind color tokens and extend with theme-friendly shadows/glows to keep styling consistent across components.
Apply the theme consistently at the page root (background, base text, spacing, and decorative layers) so all sections share the same romantic pastel system.

requirements.summary: Add and reference generated static images under frontend/public/assets/generated for the hero illustration and overlay texture, served directly by the frontend.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced by the page via static paths.
Hero uses the generated hero illustration image as its main visual.
No backend endpoints are used for serving these images.

file_operations.description: Add the generated hero illustration image asset at this exact path for direct static rendering by the frontend.
Add the generated overlay texture image asset at this exact path for compositing into dreamy overlay layers.
Reference and render the static hero image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-rose-day.dim_1600x900.png as the primary hero visual (no backend image serving).
Reference and composite the static overlay texture from frontend/public/assets/generated/overlay-bokeh-sparkles.dim_1920x1080.png into the animated bokeh/sparkle layers (no backend image serving).
